au.edu.jcu.v4l4j
Class TunerList

java.lang.Object
  au.edu.jcu.v4l4j.TunerList

public class TunerList
extends java.lang.Object

Objects of this class encapsulate a list of available Tuners. This class can not be directly instantiated. Instead, to retrieve a list of tuners from a VideoDevice, use its getTunerList() method.

Author:
gilles

public java.util.List<Tuner> getList()
This method returns a copy of the tuner list.

Returns:
a copy of the tuner list.
Throws:
StateException - if this tuner list has been released and must not be used anymore

getTuner

public Tuner getTuner(int i)
This method returns a tuner given its index.

Returns:
the tuner matching the given index, null otherwise
Throws:
StateException - if this tuner list has been released and must not be used anymore
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the given index is out of bounds
